mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCTSEQ, CATEGORY, PRODUCTNAME, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, THUMBIMG, PRODUCTCONTENT, AREACODE, ADDRESS, TELLNUMBER, RUNTIME, RATING, SEATCOUNT, LIKECOUNT, WISHCOUNT, PRODUCTCOUNT FROM PRODUCT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCTSEQ, CATEGORY, PRODUCTNAME, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, THUMBIMG, PRODUCTCONTENT, AREACODE, ADDRESS, TELLNUMBER, RUNTIME, RATING, SEATCOUNT, PRICE) VALUES (PRODUCTSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{category}, #{productname}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{thumbimg}, #{productcontent}, #{areacode}, #{address}, #{tellnumber}, #{runtime}, #{rating}, #{seatcount}, #{price})
